message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can meet you at $100, which is the lowest I can go. What do you say?
